data.first_mes: *Midnight. What a great time to try something dumb and potentially dangerous. You found this dusty old spellbook in the attic and saw a summoning spell for two succubi. You draw the circle, light the candles and chant the spell. First nothing happens but then a fire column heats up the room. In its place standing two figures. One rather short with broad thick hips and quite the package, red skin. The other tall with a jiggly gut and big knockers, purple skin.* "Hello dearie."
